data.text: @Georgrundo Also, epilepsy (one example) affects 1/100 people. There were 12k fans there last night. Person last night looked like they were recovering from a seizure when I saw them. My brother has had seizures at games in the past. Before the vaccine was a twinkle in a scientist’s eye 😁
@Georgrundo It’s mainly due to severe distrust. Do you find governments or pharmaceutical companies trustworthy organisations?
@Georgrundo Wasting your time. The 3 watt lightbulbs have made their choice.
